title: Wilko is selling £4 blinds that can fit any window and people are loving them
text:

Fitting your home with blinds can be expensive business - but Wilko is offering a bargain alternative.

Rather than paying a fortune and getting professional fitters in, the bargain store has released blinds retailing at just £4.

They can easily be cut to fit any window and are getting rave reviews online from happy customers.

The Wilko website describes them as 'quick fix, no screw, no hassle blinds' which are 'easy to install and can be easily trimmed down with scissors'.

(Image: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group)

One five star review says: "I never ever write reviews but I’m soooo pleased with these blinds I just had to spread the word.



"Follow the instructions carefully and they could easily pass for professionally fitted blinds that would normally cost a small fortune.

"Look amazing in my conservatory. One very happy customer."

They've also proved a hit in the popular Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK Facebook group, where a post from one user has attracted more than 350 comments.

(Image: Wilko)

The post say the blinds can be cut to size 'extremely easily' and come with clips which allow you to keep them at a set height.

One commented: "I had mine from Wilko and it's brilliant!"

Another said: "So easy to put up and I cut mine to size with a craft knife."

Members also compared them to Ikea's bargain version , which can also fit any window and are even cheaper at just £3.50.

One post read: "They're great for awkward sized windows!"

At such a low price, they're both certainly worth a go.
description: Happy customers have said the Wilko bargain 'could easily pass for professionally fitted blinds'
